Package com.twitter.elephantbird.pig8.util

Class Summary
AbstractLazyTuple  
LzoBufferedPositionedInputStream A wrapper around Pig's BufferedPositionedInputStream that counts the number of compressed bytes read rather than the number of decompressed bytes read.
PigContainer  
PigCounterHelper A helper class to deal with Hadoop counters in Pig.
PigTokenHelper A helper class to deal with standard Pig tokens and delimiters.
PigToProtobuf A class for turning Pig Tuples into codegen'd protos for custom Pig StoreFuncs.
PigToThrift<T extends TBase<?,?>> Coverts a Pig Tuple into a Thrift struct, assuming fields in tuples match exactly with the fields in Thrift struct.
PigUtil  
ProtobufToPig A class for turning codegen'd protos into Pig Tuples and Schemas for custom Pig LoadFuncs.
ProtobufTuple  
ThriftToPig<M extends TBase<?,?>> converts a Thrift struct to a Pig tuple utilities to provide schema for Pig loaders and Pig scripts
